title: Print reverse of a string
contentHtml:
Write a program to print reverse of a string

Reverse of a string is the string with the characters in reverse order. For example, the reverse of "hello" is "olleh".

Input  : abcd
Output : dcba

markdown:
## Write a program to print reverse of a string

Reverse of a string is the string with the characters in reverse order. For example, the reverse of "hello" is "olleh".

```
Input  : abcd
Output : dcba
```
